BR_text.BRsummary: docker build fails due to version mis-match between fastapi and pydantic
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 docker build generates this error message:
 <denchmark-code>ERROR: fastapi 0.33.0 has requirement pydantic<=0.30.0,>=0.30, but you'll have pydantic 0.30.1 which is incompatible.
 </denchmark-code>
 
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 docker build  -t ludwig .
 
 Expected behavior
 A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
 Screenshots
 If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
 Environment (please complete the following information):
 
 OS: MacOS 10.14.5 and Docker for Mac V2.0.0.3
 Version
 Python version N/A
 Ludwig version 0.1.2  (git sha1:1881700)
 
 
 docker build log file
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/uber/ludwig/files/3408930/docker_build_error.txt>docker_build_error.txt</denchmark-link>
 
 It appears that pydantic published a new release (0.30.1) on 15Jul to PyPi.  Pinning pydantic to version 0.30.0 in the requirements.txt file should address this problem.  I'll submit a PR for this fix.
